basics.name: Min-Gyu Kim
basics.label: Medical scientist
basics.summary: Medical doctor, data scientist, tech enthusiast

work.name: Ajou University Hospital
work.summary: Full-time PhD candidate in the Department of biomedical Science at Ajou University Hospital, under the supervision of Professor Rae Woong Park.

awards.title: Excellent presentation award
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding presentation at the bi-annual conference for an exploratory study on automated meta-analysis.

certificates.name: Medical Doctor
certificates.issuer: Ministry of Health and Welfare, Republic of Korea

publications.name: Efficient Compression of Whole Slide Image Using Neural Video Compression
publications.summary: Introduces an efficient compression method for whole slide images (WSIs) inspired by neural video compression techniques.

references.name: Professor Rae Woong Park
references.reference: Rae Woong Park is a professor at Ajou University Hospital, specializing in biomedical science. He has been my supervisor since May 2023.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
